definition: A digital audio or video file series that is regularly released and can be downloaded or streamed online, typically covering a wide range of topics and interests, such as news, entertainment, education, or storytelling. It is commonly consumed through various devices, allowing users to listen or watch at their convenience.

examples.german: Der Podcast hat viele interessante Gäste.
examples.english: The podcast has many interesting guests.

examples.german: Ich habe gestern einen neuen Podcast entdeckt.
examples.english: I discovered a new podcast yesterday.

examples.german: Podcasts sind eine großartige Möglichkeit, Wissen zu erweitern.
examples.english: Podcasts are a great way to expand knowledge.

examples.german: Ich abonniere regelmäßig Podcasts über Technologie.
examples.english: I regularly subscribe to podcasts about technology.
